channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security SiteProtector System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security SiteProtector System

item.title: CVE-2020-4140|2024-08-04T07:52:20.916Z -- ibm -- security%20siteprotector%20system
item.description: IBM Security SiteProtector System 3.1.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 174052.

item.title: CVE-2020-4146|2024-08-04T07:52:20.947Z -- ibm -- security%20siteprotector%20system
item.description: IBM Security SiteProtector System 3.1.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by missing 'HttpOnly' flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 174129.

item.title: CVE-2020-4150|2024-08-04T08:00:06.882Z -- ibm -- security%20siteprotector%20system
item.description: IBM SiteProtector Appliance 3.1.1 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 174142.

item.title: CVE-2020-4138|2024-08-04T07:52:20.976Z -- ibm -- security%20siteprotector%20system
item.description: IBM SiteProtector Appliance 3.1.1 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174049.
